title: WTF Just Happened to PC Memory (RAM) Prices?!
tags: how to install more ram sticks

All sponsored links and comments will contain the word "SPONSOR" or "AD." Any additional revenue stream will be disclosed with similar verbiage.  #RAM #DDR4
